name: Desiccate, Mass
description: This spell functions like desiccate, except that it affects multiple creatures.
target: One living creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

name: Mummify
description: You flash-dry a creature, killing it and preserving it in an instantaneous mummification process. A creature that makes a successful Fortitude saving throw instead takes 6d6 points of dessication damage and is dehydrated. If the damage kills the target, it is still mummified. Arcane Material Component: A strip of salted cloth.

name: Pox
description: Subjects take 1d4 points of Constitution drain. Their skin breaks out in lesions and takes on a pale yellow pallor.
target: Up to one living creature/level, no two of which can be more than 10 ft. apart
